modName: Fix For Illustrious Cloaks of skyrim
summary: For some people HDT cloaks don't work so here is a fix.
descriptionHtml:
This fixes an issue when using Illustrious cloaks of skyrim where the cloaks wouldn't appear with HDT physics even with Illustrious installed.

This fix REQUIRES CCOR: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?



I did [b]NOT[/b] make this, but the original thread where i found the fix has since been deleted and i will re upload it for people who need it

Also Note you need Cloaks of skyrim: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/? 

And Illustrious HDT Cloaks: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72581/?

To install First install cloaks of skyrim, Then my patch, And then install HDT illustrious cloaks, [OVERWRITE EVERYTHING!!!]
author: Unknown
